price: Na Ismail, na Idris, na Dhulkifli - wote walikuwa miongoni mwa wanao subiri.
arabic: وَإِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَإِدۡرِيسَ وَذَا ٱلۡكِفۡلِۖ كُلّٞ مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Watajie watu wako khabari za Ismail, na Idris, na Dhulkifli. Wote hao ni miongoni wanao subiri wakahimili taklifa na shida.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-is'māʿīla wa-id'rīsa wadhā al-kif'li kullun mina al-ṣābirīna
